content.detailedDescription:
I was in my house playing gta v. 
my dog was crying and went outside to look at the object. 
i thought it was an airplane and then i realised it was a flying disc. 
the object was refectiv and was big, it used anti-graviti effect and cause damage to my hears with some kind of noise (very stange).
i went to my house to take a photo of it but it dissaperd. 
he flew away before my phone turn on...
content.summary: It was a grey disc it flew for 30 seconds in different directions and dissaperd like an exploding star, it flew to the north.

content.detailedDescription: I left a camera 8 mm on back patio on a stand to record the sky 2 two hours tape i checked on it occasionally .And when i viewed the footage i found this object i thought first was a contrail or cloud flipping and heading to the east coming back to the west looks like it was in control but out of control.As i slowed it down more came in to view i have the org tape put away this clip can be seen anytime. i think it a ufo cloaked and the tape picked it up ....I had hopes of finding something out there but i am shocked at the results.
content.summary: I  left cam running and later found this object passing by the cam two times looking at first like a con trail moving by  and causing a flash

content.detailedDescription: Had gotten out of the hot tub to take pictures of the virgo full moon late the night of 9/8/14 when object appeared from the west/south west. it was brighter than the moon and appeared larger by half, than the moon. i managed to catch one photo.
content.summary: Appeared while witness was taking photos of the full moon

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my two dogs in the neighborhood in broad daylight (about 9:30 am).  the sky was clear, with not a single cloud.  this is probably why the sudden appearance of a dark, black trail in the sky immediately drew my attention.  at first i thought it was an asteroid, as the tail had the characteristic arc and misty appearance of an asteroid tail- but as soon as i traced the trail of the object with my eyes, i observed the object at the front to be incredibly shiny and reflective, like it was covered in chrome.  as soon as i had seen the reflection off the shiny object, it seemed to blink out of existence, with no trail left in the sky.  i searched the sky for probably 30 seconds looking for where it had gone, and whether it could have been an airplane, and i couldn't see a single other thing in the sky.  i was particularly confused at how quickly and completely it disappeared. the entire event was probably less than a second in duration.
content.summary: Walking dogs, observed shiny object with trail, thought it was an asteroid but then it dissappeared instantly.

content.detailedDescription: Basically how i've described it if you want to know more please phone me on england [phone number removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: At first we saw lights approaching at treetop as it got closer it was a cylinder it fashed lights at us and looked like it was gonna land then it ascended really high and became a yellow glowing ball it then shot from east to west at impossible speed

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving with one other person. specifically this occurred on sw56th st and 72 ave in miami, fl

it was four lights, they were coming from the east, headed to around above where i was, and then headed south. this entire time they were going in and out of a triangular position and then scattering, reuniting, scattering, and like this for about 30 seconds, then they all went in different directions. they were orange orbs with no definite shape, it was a very clear night, the other person in the car also saw the lights. 

i was captivated and could not stop staring at these lights, it was very surreal.
content.summary: Orbs were in formation, going out of formation quickly

content.detailedDescription: I looked up at the sky and saw an oval ufo in the sky it seemed to glow in a golden light i ran inside to get my husband when we came out it was on fire slowly falling from the sky suddenly a larger ship went close to it then past it then a smaller ufo that was lit up red came in from the south and another ship came in from the west all of these objects suddenly disappeared as a military helicopter approached the ufo that was falling from the sky me and my hubby and his brother all saw this i noticed there were hundreds of bats darting and acting crazy it was this that made us go inside also all of the neighborhood dogs were howling and acting spooked and several car alarms in the area started going off i was able to catch a few pics with my phone but they aren't great and my phone was going dead thanks for reading i'm concerned because i have a baby girl should i be freaking out should  we move are we going to be watched by the government i just don't know what to think or do
content.summary: My husband and i along with his brother saw a ufo catch fire and slowly fall from the skt three orher ufos one really big showed up then vanished as a military helicopter approached

content.detailedDescription:
hello,

we have just received new elements (gigantic triangular machine, daily alerts in power plants, witnesses(batons) which assert that they are not drones, testimonies in the study in private) who allow us to think that there is/are not only drones which overfly(skim through) nuclear power plants. we are can be in front of a new wave of ufos. given that this kind(genre) of event is more and more rare we want to react. so we ask all the members who wish it to arm themselves with twins(binoculars), camera with zoom, bonnettes to network, camcorder and to go(surrender) near power plants to obtain indisputable elements of proof. the chances are high that if ufos as during the vague belgian are in question the authorities not communicate............



the lights are here even every evening in various sites nuclear power, and autorit√©es does not still know what that is in ....... then they speak about drones but nobody knows what that is....
content.summary: Ufo s in nuclear sites in france !!!!

content.detailedDescription: None
content.summary: Rectangle shape with lights

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from my nursing job and arrived at my neighborhood between 23:45-24:00 (i work second shift). as i was turning in to my neighborhood, i don't know what made me notice it, but in the sky was 3 bright white lights, in a triangle formation, "gliding" across the sky. it wasn't directly above me, i didn't have to turn my head to look way up. but it was maybe at about a 45 degree angle from inside my car. it didn't make any noise. it was a really, really cloudy night, and had rained all day. it was also really windy. the lights were unobstructed by clouds, so i knew it was flying at a level below cloud cover. i live really, really close to a small airport, so i'm really used to seeing all sorts of aircraft, and this wasn't like anything else i've seen before. i stopped the car right next the street i turn onto to get home. i lost sight of it once it flew over the top of the houses (i live in a townhome community). as an afterthought, i feel like i should have drove around the block to get a better look at it, but i was alone and scared.
content.summary: 3 white lights in a triangle formation gliding in sky

content.detailedDescription: I just recorded this off my porch , was smoking a cigarette and thought i saw a really slow plane once it moved i pulled out my iphone and recorded this i stopped the video by accident i was shaking my heart is still pounding my dad came out and i should him the video it wasn't in air after i feel so tiny , i keep looking at things like it's so unimportant conpaired to the cosmos
content.summary: I just recorded this off my porch , was smoking a cigarette and thought i saw a really slow plane once it moved i pulled out my iphone and recorded this i stopped the video by accident i was shaking

content.detailedDescription: Two balls of light just hovering in almost peffect circles chasing each other and getting closer and firther from each other in the same trajectories.  i was on my balcony when i observed it for at least 30 minutes. i first thought it was a light from something on the ground but no beam was visible. and i have never seen those before or after.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two beam of lights hovering in circles

content.detailedDescription: I had gone to the marina at deer creek state park along ohio 207 south of pancoastburg, to clear my mind and to do some thinking about some things going on in my life, and i had been there for about an hour. i was listening to the local college football game on the radio when all of a sudden there was interference to the signal. i quickly looked up and out of the front of the car (i had just texted a friend on my cell phone) when i saw the light in the sky. i quickly got out of the car, which had me facing east and looked up at the object, which was about 700 to 800 feet directly above deer creek lake. it was there for about 10 seconds, then shot south for a bit then straight up and then disappeared. between the radio interference and the object, i quickly got back into my car and left the marina.
content.summary: Red light hovering over the lake

content.detailedDescription:
This was filed october 18, 2014 at 19:01:55 at nuforc. 
we never heard back. 

we live in pittsburgh west of the allegheny county airport (located in west mifflin). my wife, walking the dog in our yard, noticed a string of uniformly spaced red lights at altitude (as one would expect a life flight helicopter to be) spanning at least 40 angular degrees. she called me to the yard, and i also observed them. i observed (at times using binoculars) that they appeared to be rising, in a spaced fashion, one after another, from a single point in the southeast and heading to the southwest. we estimated they were rising in the vicinity of the airport. one plane observed was perceived by us to be lingering in the area, but the plane, a commercial airliner or cargo plane, subsequently flew over our house, so the perception of lingering must have been due to a great initial distance and we observed it flying into the area. towards the end of the event, we perceived helicopters to be flying in the area of the airport near the point we witnessed the lights ascending. the lights were red, similar to radio tower lighting. the light to the southwest most point merely extinguished, and being distracted, but not seeing the others, they too apparently went out. my initial assessment is that they were some man made thing, such as "sky lanterns" lifted by balloon or the heat rising from a candle, but problems exist with this theory. 1. they were launched near the county airport, which i would suppose to be forbidden for a legal launch, as interference to or confusion of air traffic may ensue. 2. to suppose that they were equipped with electrical power for lighting or being equipped with a candle should have provided the most recently launched light with the ability to travel from the southeast launch point to the southwest extinguish point before itself extinguishing, this clearly did not happen. i returned to the house and alternately listened to a scanning radio for the police frequencies in my area of pittsburgh and to aircraft frequencies collectively. nothing was heard to indicate that any others had called to report this incident, nor were pilots, in their very brief communications, mentioning it. i subsequently noted an establishment across the street from the county airport as having a grand opening sign, but i'm not sure how old the sign is. i drove past the county airport travelling to work, on following days, but did not notice anything to account for the lights. we perused the media for a hint of a man made cause, but found none. we found this reporting page as a result.
content.summary: String of red lights at elevation, spanning 40 degrees, in the vicinity of the allegheny county airport

content.detailedDescription: I was outdoors watching the lunar eclipse take place. once the eclipse was full, i noticed a light moving in the sky at a 45 degree angle from myself. the light at further examination was the shape of a slit and it was followed by two more lights on either side of the first light and to the rear. the position of the lights formed a triangle. once the object sailed directly over my head, i was able to confirm the shape of the object against the backdrop of the stars. it was a triangle just as described by many. it made no noise and just moved smoothly in one direction. nothing else was trailing it or around it. i am convinced that i was able to spot this object only because of the lunar eclipse and the fact that the moon was blocking most of the light pollution from the sun which cleared the night sky. the object moved south to north and i watched for about 2 minutes until i couldn't see it anymore. there was a slight overcast.
content.summary: Black triangle during lunar eclipse

content.detailedDescription: Me and my buddy had been playing video games. he was leaving and we walked outside together. he pointed out that you could hardly see any stars and we began to try and spot out what stars could be seen. i am already looking up when i notice a light almost directly above my head this fast moving white object but im looking through the tree branches directly above me.  i say out loud "is that a bird?" while pointing. my buddy jon noticed and said "no i dont think so" we stepped out from under the tree. the object had come in from the north.  as we stepped out from under the tree to get a better look it changed direction and headed to the east. my first thought was that it was one of those big lights they have when the car dealership but as soon as i thought it i knew it wasnt a light reflecting off the clouds. if anything it was a low hanging cloud, but it held its shape, changed directions, and its glow didnt seem like the normal glow from town lights. it seemed to be glowing from inside. i am just curious if anyone else has seen anything like this lately. jon is convened it was a craft and i must admit i have never seen a cloud like that. i have seen low hanging clouds that moved faster than the clouds above it but never have i seen one hold its shape as it changed directions and never glow like this. the whole thing was over in a matter of seconds, the object was out of our view somewhere east of here with in a matter of seconds. this happened this past week, a few days before halloween.  im not sure if it was the 28th but it was either the day before of after.
content.summary: Large boomerang all white glowing like a fast moving glowing cloud that help shape

content.detailedDescription: What i absorbed was white or like objects that appeared to move across the sky in a west to east pattern and then some would come from other directions and stop in place and move other directions at this point i realized that i was not watching meteorites this was something else and with the reports coming out of colorado and the video that came out of colorado in the last week or so this is what i saw what you're seeing in the videos so can't believe that no one else has saul this me and my wife observed and so did my sister-in-law
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seen what i thought was possibly meteors,but did not act like meteors

content.detailedDescription: On october 27, 2014 at 3:30 pm i was outside my residence with my camera recording some trees and the sky when i noticed some quick movements on the led screen of my camera as i was recording. later in the day as i was looking over the footage on my computer i was completely amazed and surprised to see these two ufo's in the footage! also about 10 seconds later in the footage theres a white orb very high in the sky.. couldn't believe i recorded these ufo's especially the flying saucer! they definitely have an "otherworldly" look especially the flying saucer with its moving or shifting "extensions"!
content.summary: Incredible daytime footage of two ufos at close range! triangle shaped with dome-type top first shows, then a flying saucer... at incredibly close range!

content.detailedDescription:
I and my wife sleep upstairs. our room is located on the terrace. so we are always passing through open terrace before entering our room. we both are engineers and have a great fascination for stars, galaxies, etc. we have trained our ears to quickly spot mars, jupiter in the night sky.

tonight was an unusually clear night. we took a couple of minutes to spot our favourite planets but we didn't find them. but we looked at orion nebula which we have named as 'butterfly'. i was so stuck to the clear sky that i continued to look at the it before stepping in to the our room. just then i spotted a supposed 'shooting star'. enthused, i took a step back to have a clear look. just then i found a complete pattern of lights (which were bright like stars) moving along a fixed path. 

before i could realize anything, i just pulled up my wife to show her. which she also spotted. the lights were moving without making any noise and were very fast. hence, my wife could not see the lights clearly, but only the pattern they made.

all this happened within 5-10 secs. and the ufo just disappeared.

my father had worked for 35 years in defence aircraft manufacturing. the company provided accommodation was just opposite the airport. this airport was till recently used for commercial aircrafts also. i have been born and brought up in this neighbourhood, and i am 29 years old today. i can easily spot an aircraft in the sky. but, this was not an aircraft. this was something like 10-12 boeing 747 aircrafts sized flying object moving at incredible speeds (speeds just like shooting stars).
content.summary: Just before entering our room i spotted a supposed 'shooting star'. i took a step back to have a clear look just to find a pattern of lights moving along a straight line at incredible speed. i showed the same to my wife who also saw it.

content.detailedDescription: I had just left home at 6:45 in morn on my way to meet friends. i was stopped on a corner facing north when i. saw it just above tree level. it hovered there for about five min.  it was dark so all i could see was three lights , red green and yellow.  i  thought it might be a tower but i live in the area and.  know there is no tower there.  i watched  it for about five minutes..  after five min it slowly turned east  and then turned south going very slow. it was right over the highway when i had to turn west as a car had come behind me. i saw it for a few seconds from my car mirror but then lost track of it.        i wasn't frightened at the time, just more curious than anything.
content.summary: Three lights at treetop height hovered for about five minutes then turned slowly south

content.detailedDescription:
I hope i'm not completely wasting your time, i take this sort of thing very seriously and scientifically and have the same ambitions your organization does. this event did not personally happen to me in any way, but before you flip to the next report, just bear with me for a moment and continue reading - i just simply have lived in the area of dover and have heard a lot about the dover demon case that occurred back in 1977, and vividly remember the description the witnesses gave and pictures they drew. i know this incident was not in any way a ufo case - but the bizarre entity seen that night seems to me to be remarkably consistent in behavior and appearance to the more recent case in varginha, brazil in 1996 which you of course have a case file on. 

what i'm writing to you about is that i don't know if you're particularly aware of the dover demon case since it didn't involve any ufo's and considering how many reports you get, you could easily have overlooked or simply not known about the extreme similarities between the entities described in these 2 incidents. i have no idea if there is any connection to the same type of creature or even if it is if that helps you in any way. 

but just, just in case somehow this could be a remarkable similarity in the sighting of an entity which might help you to come up with a theory of a type of classification or species of alien which could lend credibility to other sightings of very similarly described entities in the future, i wanted to make sure you're aware of it. 

it's a well known case more in the cryptozoology area than ufo research, but i always believed it to have been an alien and not an earthly inhabitant. you can find plenty of information on it and i know the people who originally witnessed it, though their names are available all over the internet as well, and i didn't speak to them before writing this so i won't give their names here, but like i said, easily found if you don't already have a case file on it.

alright, enough wasting your time. as said, just wanted to ensure someone at your network is aware of the striking coincidence between the description of these 2 creatures, or their description as i've been told/seen drawings from witnesses of, just in case it helps you in some way. 

thanks for the work you do. it's invaluable. literally.
content.summary: Old case commonly referred to as

content.detailedDescription:
I was just walking my dog in the neighborhood, simpsonville sc, like i do every night and i kept feeling like i was seeing something out of the corner of my eye and i would look up but there was nothing but stars, and a plane.  finally about the third time i looked up, i saw a void in the sky, it took me a second to focus on it because there were no lights, no sound, just a shape cruising across the sky.  i have no idea how high up it was, it was not at the height of a plane but was definitely way above the tree line, and all i could see was a shape.  it literally looked like a roundish rectangular loaf of bread flying through the sky.  there was no color to it, just a shape.  it went in a straight line, at what looked like a very consistent speed, and i was able to watch it all the way across the sky above me, until it flew out of sight.  
at first i thought the wind had caught something up but it was so steady, just crusing along, and the wind doesn't move things like that, not to mention the wind was blowing in a completely different direction, at least that is how it felt.  it's hard to describe how i felt, bewildered would probably be the best description, oh, that and...A little crazy.  i keep trying to rationalize it but i just can't. 
by far the coolest thing i have ever seen in my life.
content.summary: It literally looked like a roundish rectangular loaf of bread flying through the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home, west on rt 33, my family and i saw 4 faintly lit rotating white orbs. they were hovering over shark river. no lights/reflective stream from ground to sky observed, as in advertising beams. we pulled left off 33 to try and drive towards them, near hospital, but then,they stopped. this is 4th time i have seen lights like this. 3rd time in this ego area over 27 years. other witnesses in car. 
i was upset the lights stopped. wanted to film them, as this has been occurring for years. list sight when they stopped.
content.summary: Four soft white orbs. hovering in circular/ rotating pattern over camp evans, shark river. 3rd time witnessed here.

content.detailedDescription: Was on back deck of house in hot tub about half hour before sunset. was suprised to see bannana boat shaped craft aout 70 feet above me cruising by at a sustaned speed of about 15 mph. i thought it was a hang glider, but it had no wings no motor or motor sound. it was striking in that it had a red white & blue mozaic like pattern throughout its entirety making it too difficult to define 3-dimensionally. it had what appeared to be an interior section below a top cantopy. again the prolific red white & blue pattern prevented a detail description. its actions were that of a craft flying independent of the wind (25 mph gusts) but was also affected by the wind as it rocked & shuttered slightly in the wide turn to the east as it went by. my feelings initially were that it was a hang glider as it had a man made mcgyver like look. but at the same time my reaction was instant as i jummped up out of the tub to get my wife to see it. as i rose out of the tub i realized that due to the very low altitude it would be out of sight in 2 seconds or so. this prevented any chance of my wife seeing it. after the observation my feelings were that this was a very strange thing. the weather that day and at that time was 18 degrees f. the wind was gusting wildly and snow showers were blowing in all directions. turning from part sun to dark snow showers every few min. i have been bothered ever since as i cant reconcial what craft could be flying recon through our town at that altitude in that temp wind & snow without wings or motor. i have been haunted by this observation since it occured and have arrived at the point where i feel i need to report it. if for no other reason i would like to know if any simmilar sightings have occured. the red white & blue pattern was very pronounced.It was 10 to 12 feet long 5 feet high 4 feet wide. cruised right past me with clear control and purpose.
content.summary: Observed from hot tub first saw overhead traveled at level altitude from ne to e below large tree behind it.Was so low it quickly went out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and a friend have made ​​a lan party at my home. when it was too hot we went out onto the balcony. the object was flying very high, higher than a plane, and the way it flew was completely different, very evenly. it looked like two turbines, but without wings or the like. the turbines at the rear end shone in blue / green. from the size and shape it looked like a "podracer" from "star wars", only that the turbines are located next to the "cabin". after about 40 seconds you could see no lights the "turbines" more, we looked for another 10 minutes in the direction in which it flew, but could see nothing. as we walked back we wanted to continue playing, but the internet was not. (but also had in the past 2 weeks already problems with the router) a reboot of the router solved the problem 

sorry for my bad english. i'm from germany (used google translator)
content.summary: 2 turbines in red / blue

content.detailedDescription:
I am an airline pilot (ret) and was flying over eastern washington in the winter of 1961/1962.  the object first appeared descending at a steep flight path on a collision course with the aircraft i was flying.  when i first saw it i thought it was a b-52 descending into fairchild afb.  the craft was traveling at an extremely high rate of speed.  it stopped extremely suddenly and paced my dc-3 at our altitude for about two minutes.  then it suddenly accelerated and "flew" off in a northwesterly direction climbing at a high angle (about 30 degrees) and disappeared.  a minute or so later the craft reappeared descending out of the northwest sky.  it slowed to our airspeed at an extreme rate and paced our aircraft for two or three minutes.  the light was very bright but did not "hurt" the eyes 
or affect our night vision.  i do not know how to describe the color of the light except to say that it was "pure" white.  a "color" i have never seen elsewhere before or since.  the craft then accelerated 
into the northeast sky climbing out at a high angle of say twenty to thirty degrees.  i have no way to describe the way it accelerated.  however the craft did not pitch up to climb but remained level.  it also did this during the descents.  this is a feat that no craft with which i am acquainted can accomplish.  no noise nor propulsion system could be observed.  it appeared that the air in front of the craft  became a vacuum and it was "pushed" by the air pressure behind it.  we did not seem to be any danger once we realized that it was not going to hit us and it was not necessary to change course or altitude which was about 4,000 ft. msl.  i was very, very interested in the craft and filled with awe.  (i still am.)  my opinion was and still is that i was looking at an inter-gallactic craft.  after the event was over the captain turned to me and said:  "did you see anything?"  to which i responded:  "no."  no report was ever filed and this is the first time i have ever written about it.  the captain continued to be friends until his death and neither of us ever spoke of the event again.  as a side note it was a cold winter night with snow on the ground.  i am very acquainted with the effects of temperature inversions and other "tricks" which can be played on the eyes.  this was none of them.  i am a retired airline captain and have over 29,000 of flying time.  i have never seen anything of this nature before of since the above event.  this event changed my life forever and has haunted me from that time to this.  thank you for the opportunity to get this off my chest.
content.summary: A huge frisbee metallic object.  brilliant white light different from any light i have ever seen.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter heard the craft emitting a loud whirring noise at around 9:00 pm
approx sept, 1984. she told me the next morning. i contacted the officer of the day at the base and he confirmed the event. i called the northampton township police and they had approx 500 calls on this sighting. there was never any news on this event. the base performed radar tests on our newest aircraft at the time. f-14, f15and f-16. there was a centrifuge for astronaut training on the apolloand the start of the shuttle.
content.summary: Johnsville naval air station  training for astronauts  large ufo over base

content.detailedDescription: I had taken my children to the roller rink in jacksonville and after leaving to head home,i had just started to enter the ramp to the main street bridge, when bright lights to my right caught my eye.  they looked strange so i pulled off and stopped the car.  it was late and i saw no other traffic and it was pretty dark on the side street.  my children and i got out of the car to watch the lights.  we heard no sound but the object appeared to be a row of windows.  it looked like several small squares of bright light in a row.  at the time we first observed it, it was stationary, and was hovering across the river from us.  that was where the jacksonville ship yards was.  the squares of light began to rotate counter clockwise and move forward for several feet.  it would then hover for a few seconds and then move clock wise and move backwards.  the light was sort of blue white and we could not see inside the craft.  after approx. 10 minutes it started to move east and in the blink of the eye it was gone..I was amazed.  my oldest son was 12 at the time and i didn't think to tell him not to say anything to anyone.  the next day when he came home from school he was upset.  he had told his science teacher about the sighting and his teacher had laughed at him.   my parents believed us but we didn't tell anyone else.  we have kicked this around the family over the years and my cousin joined the air force and he became a colonel.  when he would come for a visit we would kid him and ask about area 51 or groom lake.  he would just smile and say he didn't know what we were talking about.  he did finally tell my son that he had to sign something saying he could not talk about any of his job for 75 years.  i told him he would be dead by then and he said that was the idea.  i was just sitting at home tonight and i happened to see your program on the history channel  about the pilot sightings in the 50's.  it was  very interesting.  i have always wondered if anyone else had seen something that night.  i guess it is impossible to know at this late date but i always wanted to tell someone who would not think we were nuts.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Returning from skating when i noticed lights.  pulled over, exited car to watch.

content.detailedDescription:
On a shopping trip on tuesday, october 28th at 5 p.M.  stopped for a red light at an intersection, and noticed some beautiful fall trees just across the street. i was the passenger, so i took several photos with an iphone.  while looking at the trees in front of us, conversation with the driver was about the number of wires and a telephone pole that would detract from the photograph.  we were wondering if they could be photoshopped out, but i remarked that there were far too many and decided to take photos of other trees farther to the left. all of the time that we were at the red light, we were looking across the street at the colorful trees.
i had forgotten that i took the photos until i was looking at other photos on my phone today.  i looked at the first tree photo, thinking about the wires, and suddenly saw the large object between two trees.  how could i not have seen that when i was looking at the trees or when taking the photographs?  how could either of us not have seen that?  if it had been a blimp or helicopter, or even a small plane that close to us, we would have heard something.  there was no noise other than regular traffic.
i have looked at these photographs five times today.  fascinated.  trying to figure out what that thing is and why we didn't see it when we were looking directly at its path.  thought of a lot of possibilities, but it doesn't seem to fit any category.  admittedly, i know very little about aircraft types, other than passenger planes, the stealth bomber and the flying wing, but it doesn't look like any plane i've seen, partly due to the unusual formation at the back, looking like a black triangle. doesn't seem to be a bird. not something on the windshield because it has moved behind a tree in the second photo.  i even looked up the schedule for the goodyear blimp, on the slim possibility that it might be that (although i have seen the blimp in person and it's noisy!).  blimp was in california this week anyway.  also, the object appears to be a dull gray color, no evidence of the blue and yellow on the blimp.
i would be very interested to learn what others might think this is.  i'm not saying it's otherworldly, but it sure doesn't fit any parameters *i* know.
the images are numbered 1427 and 1429. image1428 is exactly the same as 1427 because i held my finger on the button too long. sadly, not realizing that i was taking a photo of something very interesting, after photo 1429, i moved on to taking photos of trees not obscured by wires.
after i file this report, i am going to go back and look at the photos yet again.
content.summary: Photos taken of fall trees, late afternoon. object not seen until photo was looked at days later.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was on vacation with my brother and my husband ,on board of the carnival ecstasy cruise ship top deck enjoying the evening in cozumel mexico. we traveled from south florida, u.S.A. and arrived in cozumel, mexico on october 30th, 2014. we enjoyed the small island beach's and mayan homes during the day (little population and close to no electricity ,,,very limited on the island) we came back on board the ship that evening around 9:00 p.M. after our day excursions, and relaxed on top deck by about 11:00p.M. (top deck is also the only place allowed on the ship for my brother(and all 100 plus other people to smoke cigarettes on the ship.Anyways,100+ people on top deck noticed something in the sky. at first i thought it was just a airplane from a far but as it got closer and closer then above the cruise ship it was apparent that it was in fact not at all an airplane. a lot of people went in side because they were scared, but i was such in awe and i couldn't believe what i was seeing that i didn't even think to move or go inside. most of the people were in shock like myself. it was a bright red sphere that glowed and moved very very very slow across the sky as it went up and down in elevation. it flew went right over the ship as if it was examining the ship. for those who do not know cozumel mexico doesn't have much light because the small islands population/very very poor locals(no power). anyways with that being said the cruise ship was the only bright light that the eyes could see & for that matter this aircraft was very curious. after about ten minutes of about now 60 people starring from the top deck ,it finally cruised along into the sky until it instantly disappeared. it was the talk of the cruise there after for the remaining of the cruise. my brother took multiple photos, but the crazy part is the aircraft can not be seen in any of the photos from his camera phone. i know for fact he took them with the aircraft above us. everyone's photo's had everything in the picture but the spacecraft.I am now a firm believer in u.F.O's . i was never before until october 30th, 2014. after much research today now that i'm back home( nov.1,2014.) i believe it was the same spacecraft that was seen in india on october 21, 2014.
something is out there. it's studying earth and everything on it indeed.  
thanks for reading my encounter description i feel a little less crazy now, i know what i and the whole crew on the top of the cruise ship deck saw & that was a u.F.O for certain.
content.summary: Huge ,red glow ,slow moving, erractic movement
